titleStmt.title: The hackney damsells pastime, or, A summer evening frollick. To a pleasant new tune, much in request. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Charles Bates at the White-Hart in West-smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
filmed copy at UMI Tracts Supplement reel A3 is imperfect, mutilated affecting text.
